name: There can be only Juan
description:
Juan was like everyone else. He stayed at home most nights and watched TV, he slept late and woke early. He was utterly normal. Until he wasn’t. 

There can be only Juan is a game about the beat. Juan is in trouble. Fight with Juan through the onslaught of weird enemies before you run out of lives.

This game was made for the 2019 GMTK Gamejam; the theme being "Only One". It features the use of only one button to counter, which you must press on the beat of the music, as well as only using one sprite for all character assets.
